#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int MAXN = 100005;
const long double eps = 1e-8;
int n,m,val[MAXN],wt[MAXN];
long double mod_val[MAXN];
bool is_ok(long double r)
{
	for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
		mod_val[i] = (val[i] - r*wt[i]);
	sort(mod_val, mod_val+n, greater <long double> ());
	long double tot = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i)
		tot+=mod_val[i];
	return (tot >= 0);
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d", &n, &m);
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			scanf("%d %d", &val[i], &wt[i]);
		long double lo = 0, hi = 2e5, mid;
		while((hi-lo) > eps)
		{
			mid = (lo+hi)/2.0;
			if(is_ok(mid))
				lo = mid;
			else
				hi = mid;
		}
		double ans = (lo+hi)/2.0;
		printf("%.8lf\n", ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
